name: Weft Sealant
description: Helps reduce shedding and longer hair life.

name: Brazilian Lace Closures
description: Our Lace Front Closures are truely undectable and appears as if the hair was coming directly from your scalp.Our closures are truly made at a length that appears natural. Our closures are measured at a perfect size and has a natural scalp appearance. All of our closures are made with your choice of 100% Virgin Brazilian Wavy, Straight, Curly Hair. The measurement of our closures are the perfect size of 3.5″ X 3″.

name: Brazilian Straight
description:
Our 100% Virgin Brazilian Straight Human Hair is the highest quality Brazilian human hair on the market. Each selection has been collected from one donor. All cuticles are intact and you will notice each selection of our virgin hair has a natural taper at the end. This hair is much thicker and denser than Indian and Malaysian Hair and is an excellent blend for thick lustrous African American relaxed hair. All our Virgin Brazilian Straight Human Hair has undergone a stringent quality assurance process to ensure it is free of imperfections. Our Virgin Brazilian Straight Human Hair is available in a natural off black color 1b and will last well up to a year with proper care and maintenance.

Country of Origin: Brazil
Hair Texture: Straight
Virgin Hair: Yes
Weight: 100 grams (3.5oz) per bundle
Weft: Machine Weft
Styling: 2 to 3 bundles needed for full weave depending on the length of hair and volume desired

All orders take 1-3 processing and 3-7 shipping. Please allow this time to receive your order.

name: Peruvian Straight
description:
Our 100% Luxury Virgin Peruvian Straight Human Extensions is the ultimate multi-purpose hair! It's extremely soft and ultimately feather light! You can have up to five bundles of a Peruvian hair installed yet still maintain a feathery light, maintainable style. This hair is coarser in texture than Malaysian, Indian, or Brazilian hair. It blends very well with normal African-American hair textures and medium Caucasian hair textures. This hair has low luster and is extremely luxurious-definitely one of our favorites. Because of its coarse texture this hair requires lots of moisture. It will need to be conditioned often with a moisturizing conditioner.  Also, like coarser textures, it will be more prone to heat damage.
 
In comparison to Brazilian and Indian wavy hair, this texture is the coarsest which may be easier to blend with coarser textures.

Country of Origin: Peru
Hair Texture: Natural Straight
Virgin Hair: Yes
Weight: 100 grams (3.5oz) per bundle
Weft: Machine Weft
Styling: 2 to 3 bundles needed for full weave depending on the length of hair and volume desired

All orders take 1-3 processing and 3-7 shipping. Please allow this time to receive your order.

name: Eurasian Straight
description:
Our 100% Virgin Eurasian Straight Human Hair is the highest quality Eurasian human hair on the market. Each selection has been collected from one donor. All cuticles are intact and you will notice each selection of our virgin hair has a natural taper at the end. This hair is 100% Authentic from donors who are of mixed race European/Asian. Our Eurasian Straight Human Hair has Lots of body, versatility, bounce, resilience and durability. Medium density/Low to Medium luster and medium to coarse texture. All our Virgin Eurasian Straight Human Hair has undergone a stringent quality assurance process to ensure it is free of imperfections. Our Virgin Eurasian Straight Human Hair is available in a natural off black color 1b and will last well up to a year with proper care and maintenance
